message: RAVEN: Monday, February 20, 2023 at 07:44AM  - Suffering and poverty are complex issues that have many underlying causes. Some of the primary causes of suffering and poverty include inequality, lack of access to resources, lack of education, and lack of economic opportunity. Inequality can lead to disparities in access to resources, education, and economic opportunity, which can further exacerbate poverty and suffering. Additionally, political and social instability can also contribute to poverty and suffering. For example, in countries with weak or corrupt governments, citizens may not have access to basic services or resources, leading to increased poverty and suffering. Do you think there are any solutions to reduce suffering and poverty?
speaker: RAVEN
